actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gargoyle makes one Bite attack and one Claws attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 10 (2d6+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 8 (2d4+3) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Diving Pounce
special_abilities.desc: If the gargoyle is flying and moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Claws attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 STR save or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the gargoyle can make one Bite attack against it as a bonus action.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.
